definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Touch of Weakness doesn't reduce the melee damage of attacker.
sentences.chinese: 虚弱妖术没有正确地减少攻击者的近战攻击伤害。

sentences.english: The heartless witch cast a spell on the poor little girl.
sentences.chinese: 对孤苦无助的小女孩施发妖术。

sentences.english: Holy Wrath and Consecration spells will no longer deal damage to targets affected by a crowd control effect, e. g. Hex.
sentences.chinese: 神圣愤怒和奉献不再对受控制目标作用，比如妖术。

sentences.english: You can now purchase items from shops while Hexed.
sentences.chinese: 现在你中了妖术以后依然可以在商店里买东西。
漩涡武器现在作用于妖术。

sentences.english: The little girl was bound by a magic.
Perhaps I don't truly believe in the power of the black art .
sentences.chinese: 或许我真实地不相信妖术的力量。

definition: arch. legendary venomous insect/to poison/to bewitch/to drive to insanity/to harm by witchcraft/intestinal parasite
to bewitch/to enchant/to cast a spell over sb
to implement the law/to perform sorcery
incantation/magic spell/curse/malediction/to revile/to put a curse on sb
